list.name: Changes
list.comment:
[chore][closes #1][closes #2]: Initial project setup with system architecture and environment configuration
This initial commit sets up the fundamental structure and tools required for the project. It includes:
1. **System Architecture Design**: - Created the directory structure aligning with the planned system architecture. - Defined the basic modules and interfaces that will form the backbone of the application.
2. **Python Development Environment Setup**: - Configured a virtual environment to manage dependencies isolated from the global Python environment. - Installed essential libraries such as pytest for testing, and zxcvbn for password strength evaluation, documented in a requirements.txt file.
3. **Initial Repository Setup**: - Added .gitignore to exclude unnecessary files from version control (e.g., __pycache__, .env). - Created initial README.md to provide an overview of the project, setup instructions, and usage guidelines.
This setup lays the groundwork for efficient development and testing, ensuring that all development efforts are built on a solid and well-documented foundation.

task.summary:
[test]: Add unit tests for crack time estimation
Add unit tests for the new crack time estimation feature to ensure it accurately calculates and displays crack times based on password strength.
